properties.description: CIS Azure Foundations 3.0 defines benchmark controls to improve cloud security in Microsoft Azure. The standard aligns with industry best practices for risk reduction and secure configurations.

metadata.displayName: [Deprecated]: Effect for policy: Virtual machines should have the Log Analytics extension installed
metadata.description: For more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: [Deprecated]: Effect for policy: Enable Security Center's auto provisioning of the Log Analytics agent on your subscriptions with default workspace.

metadata.displayName: [Deprecated]: Log Analytics workspace
metadata.description: Auto provision the Log Analytics agent on your subscriptions to monitor and collect security data using a custom workspace.
